9_12i4LiZ39NxcYtsf36aTWJzcpzw4KFUCJy.body: I love that he is willing to stand and fight against the type of globalism that is destroying our world. A return to traditional values and patriotism is very important.

1_1Pwcc1Fk7bKMA1uayUTvZaUuaGBpvGMTRg.body: Disappointed tbh. I was really hoping it would be something better than just him shilling for his book.
